title: Gelt
body:
Project Description:
Build a fiat compliant application with a bridge to mStable Save on Polygon (L1 later on). Application will integrate an Ethereum wallet (Torus), a stablecoin on/off ramp directly connected to the ACH payment network in the US (Plaid + Wyre, SEPA support for EU by EOY), and abstract away on-chain transactions and fees for users.

Funding Objective:
Cover 50% of onboarding costs for the first 10,000 users.
Onboarding cost per user is approximately $2.5 + 0.4% of deposit amount (Plaid + Wyre). Assuming a conservative 1/9/90% distribution of deposits with $10,000/1,000/100 deposit values, the total onboarding cost for 10,000 users is $36,200.

Funding Schedule:
$10,000 USD immediately
$8000 USD after first 5,000 users are onboarded

Recipient's Address:
0xE4994082A0E7f38B565e6c5f4afD608de5EDDfBb

Additional Contributions:
Marketing support e.g. joint announcements, PR and social campaigns.
author: 0xC5e1569772b2d425Ac9469d39F17341C01e1CF4c
